title: It has been too long since I've done this!

forumNotes.author: DaemonForce
forumNotes.content:
Hey guys. I'm making a factory maintenance disc for a friend that includes(Page 1):  
Disk Commander  
DSL  
FreeNAS  
OphCrack  
Windows PE 1.8  

Page 2 has a bunch of disk prep tools.  

DSL and FreeNAS were cake but I'm running into some trouble getting OphCrack 2.3.1 to work right. It has been entirely too long since I've made memdisk images and I need some help with the config.  

Everything looks clean enough.  
I don't need to rename the boot dir.  
After this I'm just adding WinPE 1.8 and I'm done.  
Overall project is expected to hit 710MB after WinPE.  

How do I start on the image?  
What size is needed?  
What references do I need?
